result.execSummary:
The defendant Lisa A. Morgenson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Conditions:  Attend, pay for, and successfully complete any counseling or programming ordered by the agent.  No costs ordered in this case as they have been remitted by the Court.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Defendant Lisa A. Morgenson in court with attorney Lui Moefu. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  15CM232 and 16CM41 called together.  Parties' agreement stated.  Def pleads to count 2 in 15CM232 and count 1 in 16CM41.  Court's colloquy on pleas.  Finding of guilty. Sentence:  withheld for 2 years probation.  Conditions:  Attend, pay for, and succ. complete any programming ordered by agent; 1 set of costs (costs remitted in 16CM41); civil judgment at probation end if costs remaining.  Submit DNA sample at RCSD before leaving today.  Count 1 15CM232 dismissed/read in.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 21, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Counsel advise the Court that the parties are close to an agreement.  8/31 at 2:30.  Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Lisa A. Morgenson in court with attorney Lui Moefu. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin. Status in 15CM232 and initial in 16CM41. In 16CM41, formal reading waived and NG plea entered, Court having stated the charge. Further status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for May 4, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
